programme.title: Ultimate Enemies
programme.desc: Lions. Wildebeest. Two great, deadly forces of the Serengeti, clashing like thunder in the African night, and exploding into eruptions of battle under the sizzling African sun. .

programme.title: Wild Cats of India
programme.desc: India's big cats remain the soul of the Indian terrain - acting as charismatic ambassadors for the protection of their ecosystems. In Episode 1, watch the snow leopard guard his kill from an unrelenting red fox and follow the lives of the last surviving Asiatic lions of Gir. .

programme.title: Built To Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin journeys down Australia‚Äôs rivers to find which riparian animal is most built to survive. His first encounter is with the duck-billed platypus, a peculiar and adorable monotreme, or egg-laying mammal. Phil then gets a grip on the ultra-slimy long-finned eel and learns of its extraordinary reproductive habits before finally catching a river-dwelling bull shark.

programme.title: Built To Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin wanders into Australia‚Äôs woodlands to find the species most adapted for survival. Phil first encounters the yellow-bellied glider, an intrepid marsupial with a built-in wingsuit. Next is one of Australia‚Äôs most abundant but deadly reptiles, the eastern brown snake. Last but certainly not least, Phil finds the iconic, cuddly and oh-so-sleepy koala.

programme.title: Battle of the Swamp Dragons
programme.desc: South Florida is the only place on Earth that is home to both the American alligator and the American crocodile (and most recently, the Nile crocodile). But who is the baddest Florida predator? In this croc vs.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: This family farm needs a barn! The Pols are ready to tackle their next big project: preserving and carefully taking down a 100-year-old barn since, with every piece they remove makes the barn weaker and weaker. There is no room for error if they are going to transport these irreplaceable beams back to the farm and restore it to its former glory. .

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols have reached the most dangerous stage of disassembling the 100-year-old barn: taking down the beams. Then, if all goes well, theyll transport the beams back to the farm. Each part of this process must be carefully orchestrated to protect these irreplaceable beams. Meanwhile, Beth tries training Clovis after he runs away from the farm. .

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: A deadly predator is stalking the forests of Costa Rica. No, it's not a jaguar, it's a super organism made up of half a million tiny individuals -- an army ant colony..

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: On the edge of the Sahara Desert in Mali, a society struggles to thrive. This isn't a society of humans but of rare desert elephants. More than just a herd of animals, they are a tribe of extended families and comrades with their own unique culture.

programme.title: Russia's Wild Tiger
programme.desc: RUSSIA'S WILD TIGER records the battle for survival of the big cats and reveals intimate details of their lives. The animals they prey on are also in the film: tigers couldn‚Äôt survive without sika deer, Altai wapiti, wild boars and Asian black bears. A young tiger, born in a conservation area, will guide the viewer through the film. RUSSIA'S WILD TIGER accompanies him throughout the year after he leaves his mother.

programme.title: Planet Carnivore: Perfect Killers
programme.desc: Great White sharks, polar bears, lions and brown bears battle rivals and the elements to maintain their positions at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: Jaguar: Jungle Icon Of Guyana
programme.desc: A young jaguar is about to embark on the most important mission of his life, : to strike out and find a kingdom of his own. His journey will take him through varied habitats, each with its own cast of animals. Only if he can prove his worth will the jaguar be able to claim his throne in one of the last truly wild paradises on the planet.

programme.title: Russia's Wild Tiger

programme.title: Planet Carnivore: Perfect Killers
programme.desc: Great White sharks, polar bears, lions and brown bears battle rivals and the elements to maintain their positions at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: Jaguars Vs. Crocs
programme.desc: Veteran wildlife photographer Steve Winter and cameraman Bertie Gregory capture the remarkable lives of Jaguars in the Pantanal of Brazil. A mother jaguar teaches her cub survival while a determined male jaguar named Scarface dives headfirst into the river to tackle the deadliest of opponents - 6-foot long caiman. Clever capybaras and playful giant otters stick with their family members to avoid being jaguar dinner.

programme.title: Land Of The Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Jaguar: Jungle Icon Of Guyana
programme.desc: A young jaguar is about to embark on the most important mission of his life, : to strike out and find a kingdom of his own. His journey will take him through varied habitats, each with its own cast of animals. Only if he can prove his worth will the jaguar be able to claim his throne in one of the last truly wild paradises on the planet.

programme.title: Jaguar Beach
programme.desc: On a remote stretch of Central America‚Äôs Pacific coast, the lush, volcanic landscape gives way to a startlingly different world: a dry tropical forest. Here, two creatures ‚Äî the sea turtle and the jaguar ‚Äî meet with spectacular consequences for both their species and the very different environments they inhabit, and an unwitting alliance turns the predator into the protector.

programme.title: Rare Cat Skills
programme.desc: Rare wild cats showcase extraordinary skills for survival. Over millennia, each species evolved with unique adaptations to suit their environment. The Pallas‚Äôs cat blends into China‚Äôs rocky steppes, the black panther hunts in India‚Äôs forest shadows, and the snow leopard scales icy Himalayan peaks. Every camouflage trick, extraordinary skill and heightened sense are their keys to survival.

programme.title: Amur Tiger: Secret Kingdom
programme.desc: In the remote reaches of northeast China, lie vast forests - the realm of the Amur tiger. One of the planet‚Äôs rarest predators, Amur tigers roam the land in search of food and mates, while sharing their territory with many other iconic creatures, like the Amur leopard and the Asiatic black bear. Immersed in a rich and fragile ecosystem, these magnificent felines adapt their fortunes as the seasons change.

programme.title: Russia's Wild Tiger

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol has helped kids show animals at the county fair for more than 40 years. For some families, its a tradition going back generations. Raising fair animals takes months of work, and it all pays off at showtime! At the clinic, Doc helps a limping steer with a swollen leg, Dr. Brenda treats a urinary blockage that threatens a cats kidneys, and Dr. Lisa bandages a wounded dog.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Its Mothers Day! Dr. Pol and Dr. Brenda rush to the aid of animals struggling to give birth, while Dr. Lisa treats a cow suffering from a postpartum emergency. Two puppies get poked for their vaccines, and two older dogs come in with quills stuck all over their bodies. As Mothers Day approaches, Doc and Charles cook up a special treat for Diane and Beth. .

programme.title: Wild Mongolia: Land Of Extremes
programme.desc: Trapped on a mountain plateau at the heart of Asia, lies one of the most extreme desert environments in the world, The Gobi. .

programme.title: Wild Mongolia: Land Of Extremes
programme.desc: The Mongolian Steppe lies trapped between the Taiga forests in the North and the Gobi desert in the South. It's home to animals whose lives revolve around one essential thing: Grass. .
